FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: study
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Study

FIELD.LABEL: Study ID
FIELD.NAME: study_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study

FIELD.LABEL: Title
FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A name given to the study or project. Project title should be fewer than 30 words, such as a title of a grant proposal or a publication.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Study of single cells in the human body

FIELD.LABEL: Description
FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A detailed description of the project which includes research goals and experimental approach. Project description should be fewer than 300 words, such as an abstract from a grant application or publication.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: This project explores the intricate details of single cells in the human body, focusing on their structure, function, and behavior. By studying individual cells, it aims to uncover how they contribute to overall health, disease progression, and human biology. This research can provide deeper insights into cellular processes, paving the way for advancements in medical treatments and personalised medicine.

FIELD.LABEL: Bibliographic Citation
FIELD.NAME: bibliographicCitation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A citation for the study resource, following a standard format.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Doe J., et al. (2024). Single Cell Transcriptomic Analysis of Human Liver Cells. Journal of Cellular Biology.

FIELD.LABEL: Created
FIELD.NAME: created
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date when the study was created or registered.

FIELD.LABEL: Workflow
FIELD.NAME: workflow
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The workflow or protocol followed during the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Technology
FIELD.NAME: technology
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The sorting or visualisation technology used.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: person
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Person

FIELD.LABEL: First Name
FIELD.NAME: givenName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The first name of a Person.

FIELD.LABEL: Last Name
FIELD.NAME: familyName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The last name of a Person.

FIELD.LABEL: Affiliation/Institution
FIELD.NAME: affiliation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

FIELD.LABEL: Funder
FIELD.NAME: funder
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

FIELD.LABEL: Grant Award
FIELD.NAME: funding
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A Grant that directly or indirectly provide funding or sponsorship for this item.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sample
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Sample

FIELD.LABEL: Study ID
FIELD.NAME: study_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for the study if refering to

FIELD.LABEL: Sample ID
FIELD.NAME: sample_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Scientific Name
FIELD.NAME: scientificName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the species studied.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism
FIELD.NAME: organism
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the species studied.

FIELD.LABEL: Tissue
FIELD.NAME: tissue
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of tissue sampled for the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Preparations
FIELD.NAME: preparations
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A brief description of how the sample was preserved.

FIELD.LABEL: Event Date
FIELD.NAME: eventDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date when the sample was collected with year, month and day specified in the format, YYYY-MM-DD.

FIELD.LABEL: Decimal Latitude
FIELD.NAME: decimalLatitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographic latitude where the specimen or sample was taken in decimal degrees, between -90 and 90. Locations should be specified to a minimum of 3 decimal places and a maximum of 8 decimal places.

FIELD.LABEL: Decimal Longitude
FIELD.NAME: decimalLongitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The longitude of the sample collection site, in decimal degrees.

FIELD.LABEL: Medium
FIELD.NAME: medium
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Cultivar
FIELD.NAME: cultivar
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A plant variety that has been selectively bred and maintained through cultivation to have specific desirable traits, such as yield, resistance to disease, or appearance.

FIELD.LABEL: Material Source ID
FIELD.NAME: materialSourceID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The code used to identify the biological germplasm, strain, cell line or other source material. Useful for reordering material.

FIELD.LABEL: Accession Number
FIELD.NAME: accession_number
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier assigned to the sample in the study related to NCBI Taxonomy.

FIELD.LABEL: Class
FIELD.NAME: class
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the class in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Collection Code
FIELD.NAME: collectionCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name, acronym, code, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Collection ID
FIELD.NAME: collectionID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the collection or dataset from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Continent
FIELD.NAME: continent
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the continent in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Country Code
FIELD.NAME: countryCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The standard code for the country in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: County
FIELD.NAME: county
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (county, shire, department, etc.) in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Cultivar Epithet
FIELD.NAME: cultivarEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Part of the name of a cultivar, cultivar group or grex that follows the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Dataset ID
FIELD.NAME: datasetID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

FIELD.LABEL: Dataset Name
FIELD.NAME: datasetName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Date Identified
FIELD.NAME: dateIdentified
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date on which the subject was determined as representing the dwc:Taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Disposition
FIELD.NAME: disposition
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The current state of a specimen with respect to the collection identified in dwc:collectionCode or dwc:collectionID.

FIELD.LABEL: Infraspecific Epithet
FIELD.NAME: infraspecificEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the lowest or terminal infraspecific epithet of the dwc:scientificName, excluding any rank designation.

FIELD.LABEL: Institution ID
FIELD.NAME: institutionID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

FIELD.LABEL: Island
FIELD.NAME: island
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the island on or near which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Island Group
FIELD.NAME: islandGroup
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the island group in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Kingdom
FIELD.NAME: kingdom
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Language
FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A language of the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Locality
FIELD.NAME: locality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The specific description of the place.

FIELD.LABEL: Location According To
FIELD.NAME: locationAccordingTo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Information about the source of this dcterms:Location information. Could be a publication (gazetteer), institution, or team of individuals.

FIELD.LABEL: Location ID
FIELD.NAME: locationID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of dcterms:Location information. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Location Remarks
FIELD.NAME: locationRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Material Entity Remarks
FIELD.NAME: materialEntityRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:MaterialEntity instance.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: found in association with charred remains

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Depth In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumDepthInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Distance Above Surface In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The greater distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Elevation In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumElevationInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The upper limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Depth In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumDepthInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Distance Above Surface In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lesser distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Elevation In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumElevationInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lower limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in metres

FIELD.LABEL: Organism ID
FIELD.NAME: organismID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:Organism instance (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Organism). May be a globally unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Quantity
FIELD.NAME: organismQuantity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A number or enumeration value for the quantity of dwc:Organisms.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Quantity Type
FIELD.NAME: organismQuantityType
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of quantification system used for the quantity of organisms.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Remarks
FIELD.NAME: organismRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:Organism instance.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: One of a litter of six

FIELD.LABEL: Phylum
FIELD.NAME: phylum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the phylum or division in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Recorded By
FIELD.NAME: recordedBy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person, group, or organization responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Recorded By ID
FIELD.NAME: recordedByID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of the globally unique identifier for the person, people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Reproductive Condition
FIELD.NAME: reproductiveCondition
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reproductive condition of the biological individual(s) represented in the dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Size Unit
FIELD.NAME: sampleSizeUnit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The unit of measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Size Value
FIELD.NAME: sampleSizeValue
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A numeric value for a measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sampling Effort
FIELD.NAME: samplingEffort
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The amount of effort expended during a dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sampling Protocol
FIELD.NAME: samplingProtocol
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The methods or protocols used during a dwc:Event, denoted by an IRI.

FIELD.LABEL: Specific Epithet
FIELD.NAME: specificEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the first or species epithet of the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Subfamily
FIELD.NAME: subfamily
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the subfamily in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Subgenus
FIELD.NAME: subgenus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the subgenus in which the dwc:Taxon is classified. Values should include the genus to avoid homonym confusion.

FIELD.LABEL: Taxon Concept ID
FIELD.NAME: taxonConceptID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the taxonomic concept to which the record refers - not for the nomenclatural details of a dwc:Taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Taxon Remarks
FIELD.NAME: taxonRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the taxon or name.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: this name is a misspelling in common use

FIELD.LABEL: Taxonomic Status
FIELD.NAME: taxonomicStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The status of the use of the dwc:scientificName as a label for a taxon. Requires taxonomic opinion to define the scope of a dwc:Taxon. Rules of priority then are used to define the taxonomic status of the nomenclature contained in that scope, combined with the experts opinion. It must be linked to a specific taxonomic reference that defines the concept.

FIELD.LABEL: Type
FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nature or genre of the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Coordinate System
FIELD.NAME: verbatimCoordinateSystem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The spatial coordinate system for the dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude or the dwc:verbatimCoordinates of the dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Coordinates
FIELD.NAME: verbatimCoordinates
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original spatial coordinates of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Depth
FIELD.NAME: verbatimDepth
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original description of the depth below the local surface.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Elevation
FIELD.NAME: verbatimElevation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original description of the elevation (altitude, usually above sea level) of the Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Event Date
FIELD.NAME: verbatimEventDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original representation of the date and time information for a dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Identification
FIELD.NAME: verbatimIdentification
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Label
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLabel
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The content of this term should include no embellishments, prefixes, headers or other additions made to the text. Abbreviations must not be expanded and supposed misspellings must not be corrected. Lines or breakpoints between blocks of text that could be verified by seeing the original labels or images of them may be used. Examples of material entities include preserved specimens, fossil specimens, and material samples. Best practice is to use UTF-8 for all characters. Best practice is to add comment ‚Äö√Ñ√∫verbatimLabel derived from human transcription‚Äö√Ñ√π in dwc:occurrenceRemarks.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Latitude
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLatitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original latitude of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Locationality
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLocality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original textual description of the place.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: 25 km NNE Bariloche por R. Nac. 237

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Longitude
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLongitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original longitude of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim SRS
FIELD.NAME: verbatimSRS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which coordinates given in dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude, or dwc:verbatimCoordinates are based.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Taxon Rank
FIELD.NAME: verbatimTaxonRank
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the dwc:scientificName as it appears in the original record.

FIELD.LABEL: Vernacular Name
FIELD.NAME: vernacularName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A common or vernacular name.

FIELD.LABEL: Vertical Datum
FIELD.NAME: verticalDatum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The vertical datum used as the reference upon which the values in the elevation terms are based.

FIELD.LABEL: Vitality
FIELD.NAME: vitality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An indication of whether a dwc:Organism was alive or dead at the time of collection or observation.

FIELD.LABEL: Water Body
FIELD.NAME: waterBody
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the water body in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Material Sample ID
FIELD.NAME: materialSampleID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:MaterialSample (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:MaterialSample). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:materialSampleID globally unique.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: file
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: File

FIELD.LABEL: Study ID
FIELD.NAME: study_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study

FIELD.LABEL: File ID
FIELD.NAME: file_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this file

FIELD.LABEL: Imaging Protocol ID
FIELD.NAME: imaging_protocol_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for the imaging protocol.

FIELD.LABEL: File Name
FIELD.NAME: file_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A filename or file name is a name used to uniquely identify a data file related to the study.

FIELD.LABEL: File Type
FIELD.NAME: file_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A file type is a name given to a specific kind of file. Common file types are fastq, gtf, fasta, bam, etc.

FIELD.LABEL: Centroid X
FIELD.NAME: centroidX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: X Coordinate of the approximate center pixel for this sample

FIELD.LABEL: Centroid Y
FIELD.NAME: centroidY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Y Coordinate of the approximate center pixel for this sample

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: imaging_protocol
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Imaging Protocol

FIELD.LABEL: Study ID
FIELD.NAME: study_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study

FIELD.LABEL: Imaging Protocol ID
FIELD.NAME: imaging_protocol_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for the imaging protocol.

FIELD.LABEL: Platform
FIELD.NAME: platform
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The platform used to isolate the cells.

FIELD.LABEL: Instrument
FIELD.NAME: instrument
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The instrument used to isolate the cells.

FIELD.LABEL: Target Probes
FIELD.NAME: target_probes
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of probes used to detect and quantify specific RNA molecules in their native spatial context within a tissue or cell.

FIELD.LABEL: Section Thickness Œúm
FIELD.NAME: section_thickness_¬µm
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The thickness of the tissue section in micrometres.

FIELD.LABEL: Section Thickness Method
FIELD.NAME: section_thickness_method
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method used to measure tissue section thickness.

FIELD.LABEL: Section Thickness Temperature
FIELD.NAME: section_thickness_temperature
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The temperature at which the section was made in degree celsius.

FIELD.LABEL: Is Pathological
FIELD.NAME: is_pathological
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's being abnormal and having a destructive effect on living tissue.

FIELD.LABEL: Photobleaching Duration In Hours
FIELD.NAME: photobleaching_duration_in_hours
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The duration of photobleaching in hours

FIELD.LABEL: Instrument User Guide
FIELD.NAME: instrument_user_guide
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The user guide for the instrument used.

FIELD.LABEL: Instrument User Guide Revision
FIELD.NAME: instrument_user_guide_revision
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The revision of the instrument user guide.

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Preparation Guide
FIELD.NAME: sample_preparation_guide
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The guide used for sample preparation.

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Preparation Guide Revision
FIELD.NAME: sample_preparation_guide_revision
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The revision of the sample preparation guide.

FIELD.LABEL: Deviations From Official Protocol
FIELD.NAME: deviations_from_official_protocol
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Any deviations from the official protocol. Separate individual deviations with '|'.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Temperature exceeded 25¬∞C during storage | Sample handling delayed by 2 hours
